name: Cross-Platform Search Campaign (Google + Bing)

steps.description: AI generates base keywords applicable to both platforms
Optimize keywords and bids for Google vs Bing characteristics
Generate RSAs optimized for each platform's audience
Create campaign with allocated budget and optional LinkedIn targeting
After 14 days, compare ROAS and adjust budget allocation if auto-optimize enabled
